name: simd_float2x2
desc: A matrix of two columns and two rows that contains single-precision values.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new matrix.

items.name: init(Float)
items.desc: Creates a new matrix with the specified scalar value on the main diagonal.

items.name: init(diagonal: SIMD2<Float>)
items.desc: Creates a new matrix with the specified vector on the main diagonal.

items.name: init([SIMD2<Float>])
items.desc: Creates a new matrix with the specified columns.

items.name: init(SIMD2<Float>, SIMD2<Float>)
items.desc: Creates a new matrix with the specified vectors as columns.

items.name: init(columns: (simd_float2, simd_float2))
items.desc: Creates a new matrix with the specified columns.

items.name: init(rows: [SIMD2<Float>])
items.desc: Creates a new matrix with the specified rows.

items.name: let matrix_identity_float2x2: simd_float2x2
items.desc: A 2 x 2 identity matrix.

items.name: var determinant: Float
items.desc: The determinant of the matrix.

items.name: var inverse: simd_float2x2
items.desc: The inverse of the matrix.

items.name: var transpose: float2x2
items.desc: The transpose of the matrix.

items.name: var columns: (simd_float2, simd_float2)
items.desc: The columns of the matrix.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A representation of the matrix that is suitable for debugging.

items.name: func simd_matrix(simd_float2, simd_float2) -> simd_float2x2
items.desc: Returns a new matrix with the specified columns.

items.name: func simd_matrix_from_rows(simd_float2, simd_float2) -> simd_float2x2
items.desc: Returns a new matrix with the specified rows.

items.name: func matrix_from_rows(SIMD2<Float>, SIMD2<Float>) -> simd_float2x2
items.desc: Returns a new matrix with the specified rows.

items.name: func simd_diagonal_matrix(simd_float2) -> simd_float2x2
items.desc: Returns a new matrix with the specified vector on the main diagonal.

items.name: func simd_add(simd_float2x2, simd_float2x2) -> simd_float2x2
items.desc: Returns the sum of two matrices.

items.name: func simd_sub(simd_float2x2, simd_float2x2) -> simd_float2x2
items.desc: Returns the difference of two matrices.

items.name: func matrix_scale(Float, simd_float2x2) -> simd_float2x2
items.desc: Returns the product of a scalar value and a matrix.

items.name: func simd_mul(Float, simd_float2x2) -> simd_float2x2
items.desc: Returns the product of a scalar value and a 2 x 2 matrix.

items.name: func simd_mul(simd_float2, simd_float2x2) -> simd_float2
items.desc: Returns the product of a two-element vector and a 2 x 2 matrix.

items.name: func matrix_multiply(simd_float2, simd_float2x2) -> simd_float2
items.desc: Returns the product of a two-element vector and a 2 x 2 matrix.

items.name: func simd_mul(simd_float2x2, simd_float2) -> simd_float2
items.desc: Returns the product of a 2 x 2 matrix and a two-element vector.

items.name: func matrix_multiply(simd_float2x2, simd_float2) -> simd_float2
items.desc: Returns the product of a 2 x 2 matrix and a two-element vector.

items.name: func simd_mul(simd_float2x2, simd_float2x2) -> simd_float2x2
items.desc: Returns the product of a 2 x 2 matrix and a 2 x 2 matrix.

items.name: func matrix_multiply(simd_float2x2, simd_float2x2) -> simd_float2x2
items.desc: Returns the product of a 2 x 2 matrix and a 2 x 2 matrix.

items.name: func simd_mul(simd_float3x2, simd_float2x3) -> simd_float2x2
items.desc: Returns the product of a 3 x 2 matrix and a 2 x 3 matrix.

items.name: func matrix_multiply(simd_float3x2, simd_float2x3) -> simd_float2x2
items.desc: Returns the product of a 3 x 2 matrix and a 2 x 3 matrix.

items.name: func simd_mul(simd_float4x2, simd_float2x4) -> simd_float2x2
items.desc: Returns the product of a 4 x 2 matrix and a 2 x 2 matrix.

items.name: func matrix_multiply(simd_float4x2, simd_float2x4) -> simd_float2x2
items.desc: Returns the product of a 4 x 2 matrix and a 2 x 4 matrix.

items.name: func simd_equal(simd_float2x2, simd_float2x2) -> simd_bool
items.desc: Returns true if every element in a matrix is exactly equal to the corresponding element in a second matrix.

items.name: func simd_almost_equal_elements(simd_float2x2, simd_float2x2, Float) -> simd_bool
items.desc: Returns true if every element in a matrix is within a specified tolerance to the corresponding element in a second matrix.

items.name: func simd_almost_equal_elements_relative(simd_float2x2, simd_float2x2, Float) -> simd_bool
items.desc: Returns true if every element in a matrix is within a specified single-precision relative tolerance to the corresponding element in a second matrix.

items.name: func simd_determinant(simd_float2x2) -> Float
items.desc: Returns the determinant of the specified matrix.

items.name: func simd_inverse(simd_float2x2) -> simd_float2x2
items.desc: Returns the inverse of the specified matrix.

items.name: func simd_linear_combination(Float, simd_float2x2, Float, simd_float2x2) -> simd_float2x2
items.desc: Returns the linear combination of two scalar values and two matrices.

items.name: func simd_transpose(simd_float2x2) -> simd_float2x2
items.desc: Returns the transpose of a matrix.

items.name: subscript(Int) -> SIMD2<Float>
items.desc: Accesses the column at the specified position.

items.name: subscript(Int, Int) -> Float
items.desc: Accesses the element at the specified position.

items.name: typealias float2x2
items.desc: A type alias for a single-precision 2 x 2 matrix.

items.name: typealias matrix_float2x2
items.desc: A type alias for a single-precision 2 x 2 matrix.

items.name: func matrix_invert(simd_float2x2) -> simd_float2x2
items.desc: Returns the inverse of the specified matrix.
